```{R, echo = FALSE,comment="", message = FALSE}
library(leaflet)
Icon <- makeIcon(iconUrl = "https://www.onlygfx.com/wp-content/uploads/2017/12/grunge-yes-no-icon-1-902x1024.png", 
                        iconWidth = 31*215/230, iconHeight = 31,
                        iconAnchorX = 31*215/230/2, iconAnchorY = 16
)

df <- data.frame(
lat = c(39.2973166, 39.3288851, 39.2906617),
lng = c(-76.5929798, -76.6206598, -76.5469683),col = c("red", "blue", "green"))


dfSites <- c(
"<a href='http://www.jhsph.edu/'>East Baltimore Campus</a>",
"<a href='https://apply.jhu.edu/visit/homewood/'>Homewood Campus</a>",
"<a href='http://www.hopkinsmedicine.org/johns_hopkins_bayview/'> Medical Center</a>"
)
df %>%
leaflet() %>%
addTiles() %>%
addMarkers(icon = Icon, popup = dfSites)%>%
addCircleMarkers(weight = 1, radius = 50, color = df$col) %>%
addLegend(labels = c("East","Homewood","Medical"), colors = c("red", "blue", "green"))
```
